name: Skellington
description:
i really fumbled this project the last couple weeks

80% of the content available in the project files is going unused in this build,

but i really need to do something else rn

i wanted to release it on steam aswell, but the game is not up to my standards

it's not that good rn.

the steam page is still up, and it will be released there eventually

but for now, the development is on hold

project files on patreon btw:  https://www.patreon.com/fabianvelander
